summary: A unit‑test suite that constructs lightweight dummy components to exercise the Stable Diffusion ControlNet pipeline with Prompt Attention Guidance (PAG). It validates pipeline configuration, the ability to enable or disable PAG, and behavior during unconditional image generation.
business_intent: Guarantee the correctness and stability of the ControlNet‑enhanced Stable Diffusion implementation, enabling reliable deployment of AI‑driven image generation features that rely on prompt‑level guidance.
